=== Roadmap ===

<nowiki>[[http://farm9.staticflickr.com/8197/8201249000_206b3a96a9_z.jpg|{{http://farm9.staticflickr.com/8197/8201249000_206b3a96a9_z.jpg||width="300",align="right"}}]]</nowiki>

* We'll continue <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/~ubuntu-l10n-ast | translating]]</nowiki> Ubuntu to Asturian language. Ubuntu 12.10 is translated in about 96% and Asturian has 19th place in <nowiki>[[http://people.canonical.com/~dpm/stats/ubuntu-12.10-translation-stats.html|Ubuntu translation stats]]</nowiki>. 
* We will make several <nowiki>[[http://ubuntu-ast.org/?q=ast | "Install Parties"]]</nowiki> of most of the Ubuntu releases (at least with LTS's).
* We would like to make some <nowiki>[[http://ubuntu-ast.org/?q=ast | talks]]</nowiki> about Ubuntu at schools, institutes and random places.
* We will try to introduce Ubuntu in that fields we could be able to introduce in.
